Articles.Content:
I woke up with a funny idea. What if Kerbals like Olympic Games too?

This is the spot to post all olympic games related crafts and vessels: You built a Spacestation in form of the Olympic Rings? Post it here. You have a nice kerbaly idea to ignite olympic flames (moooar Fire !!! )? Post them here... You let kerbals stylishly jump into the pool on the KSC from a tower? Post it here... 

 

Let the kerbal olympic games be opened. Have fun...
